Using this strategy, Kolulu catches up to Amira, and the two enter into an intense battle as Amira forces her way through the brain freezes.

Name: Announcer
Origin: Are you reeeaaady for daaay two!

Name: Announcer
Origin: I can feel the passion, the grit, and the zeal from yesterday flowing into today!

Name: Announcer
Origin: As you all know, we've got a morning bracket and an afternoon bracket ahead of us.

Name: Announcer
Origin: Our two powerhouses, Redluck and Mash, won't show up until the later match.

Name: Announcer
Origin: Which means this morning one is going to be a free for all! Who will win? Anything can happen!

Name: Announcer
Origin: However, I've got my eye on at least one contestant... One who put on an incredible show yesterday!

Name: Announcer
Origin: That's right, folks; I'm talking about Amira!

Name: Male Spectator 1
Origin: Amira! You can win this!

Name: Female Spectator 1
Origin: We believe in you!

Name: Amira
Origin: They're the ones who gave me food. Right, I won't lose.

Name: Announcer
Origin: Can you hear that cheering? She's got a fan base already!

Name: Io
Origin: Amira's great, but so is Kolulu!

Name: Io
Origin: Kolulu! Show them you've got what it takes!

Name: Kolulu
Origin: Thank you, Io! I shall do you proud!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Leona, you can do it too!

Name: Leona
Origin: Thank you! Lyria, I'll eat enough for you!

Name: Announcer
Origin: Now that's what I'm talking about! We love to hear the crowd go wild!

Name: Announcer
Origin: But let's rein it in for a sec while we go over today's dish!

Name: Announcer
Origin: If you'll turn your attention here...

Name: Announcer
Origin: Lumber jellato!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Oh gosh, it looks so pretty and tasty!

Name: Announcer
Origin: A little bit of a change from sushi, but who doesn't like dessert?

Name: Announcer
Origin: It's even got a bit of Auguste in its design! Reminds you of our beautiful sea, right?

Name: Announcer
Origin: The chewy blue-dyed lumber jelly's got a bit of saltiness to it which will bring out the sweetness of the ice cream.

Name: Announcer
Origin: Making it a treat for both the tongue and eyes!

Name: Kolulu
Origin: Gulp... It's a bit strange looking, but hearing it described like that is getting my appetite going.

Name: Announcer
Origin: It's definitely a dessert worth savoring—too bad our contestants won't get that luxury.

Name: Announcer
Origin: Because this is going to be a timed battle! Whoever eats the most jellato in the allotted time will advance to the final round!

Name: Announcer
Origin: Survival of the fittest! Battle of the toughest! Who can gorge themselves to the max!

Name: Announcer
Origin: Better get started before the sun melts it all!

Name: Announcer
Origin: Ready... Eat!

Name: Kolulu
Origin: Thanks for the food! Munch, chew...

Name: Kolulu
Origin:
...!
It's so cold!

Name: Kolulu
Origin: Like eating stew, except the opposite temperature! This is delicious!

Name: Leona
Origin: Oh yeeees, this coolness is just the thing for a hot day.

Name: Leona
Origin: Wait, this isn't the time to chill out! I have to keep eating.

Name: Amira
Origin: Chomp, chew, gulp... Sweet. I like it.

Name: Amira
Origin: Next one please.

Name: Announcer
Origin: Whoa! Amira's already finished her first serving!

Name: Announcer
Origin: Is she actually going to be this morning's uncontested champion?

Name: Kolulu
Origin: What speed...

Name: Leona
Origin: I-I can go just as fast!
Kolulu and Leona gobble their glasses of jellato down in a furious rush to catch up to Amira.
However, every competitor's pace begins to slow as time passes.

Name: Leona
Origin: Owowow... Brain... freeze...

Name: Kolulu
Origin: My head...

Name: Announcer
Origin: The inevitable has finally occurred!

Name: Announcer
Origin: Being a competitive eater's not only about eating a lot, folks! You have to know how to deal with brain freezes too!

Name: Announcer
Origin: Whoever can push past the pain might just be our champion!

Name: Kolulu
Origin: Feels like... someone is stabbing my head with Stone Breaker...

Name: Kolulu
Origin: To think mere food could pierce the walls of my cranium...

Name: Kolulu
Origin: But my skull hasn't cracked yet! I won't be defeated!

Name: Kolulu
Origin: Haah!
Kolulu holds her breath and squeezes her eyes shut.
Through sheer willpower, or perhaps a stroke of luck, the pain gradually ebbs away.

Name: Redluck
Origin: (Not bad, not bad. She probably doesn't know why that worked, but...)

Name: Kolulu
Origin: This is a prime opportunity, and I shan't waste it!
A hurried glance to the side reveals that Kolulu alone escaped the headache.

Name: Amira
Origin: Argh... Head hurts... Is this a magic curse? No... But what...

Name: Kolulu
Origin: (I'm not that far behind Amira! I can still catch up!)

Name: Kolulu
Origin: My counterattack starts now!
Repeating the same technique from earlier, Kolulu chews at a consistent pace and steadily plows forward.

Name: Announcer
Origin: Hooold up, folks! We thought this bracket was over with, but clearly Kolulu wants to prove us wrong!

Name: Announcer
Origin: She's downing the jellato like nobody's business! Could this be... a comeback?

Name: Amira
Origin: I won't... lose!
Amira pushes past the head-splitting agony and desperately shovels more jellato into her mouth.

Name: Announcer
Origin: But Amira is still going! Can she keep her lead?

Name: Announcer
Origin: Who will come out on top?

Time is called, and Kolulu and Amira tie for first place, meaning both of them will move on to the final round. Afterward, [Djeeta], Lyria, and Vyrn wander the stalls in search of drinks and run into Lucio. Vyrn spots juice in Lucio's hands and asks for a sip, but Lucio refuses, explaining that it expired two years earlier. The thirsty crew members bid Lucio farewell and continue their search. Lucio then takes a sip of the juice and remarks that the liquid is 'quite awful.'

Name: Announcer
Origin: And that's time!

Name: Kolulu
Origin: Burp... I can't eat any more...

Name: Amira
Origin: Head hurts...
Staff members go around tallying up empty glasses while the audience waits with bated breath.
Soon the results are given to the announcer.

Name: Announcer
Origin: From the preliminaries to the first bracket of the elimination round... It's been quite a time, hasn't it?

Name: Announcer
Origin: But thank you for your patience! The results are in, so let's get to it!

Name: Announcer
Origin: I am delighted to announce the winner for the morning bracket is...

Name: Announcer
Origin: Amira!

Name: Amira
Origin: That sure was tough.

Name: Kolulu
Origin: So in the end, I didn't manage to catch up...

Name: Kolulu
Origin: Sometimes that's just how it goes, I suppose. But I have no regrets for—

Name: Announcer
Origin: And our second winner is...

Name: Announcer
Origin: Kolulu!

Name: Kolulu
Origin: Huh?

Name: Announcer
Origin: Bet nobody saw that coming! I sure didn't, at least!

Name: Announcer
Origin: Both contestants managed to consume the exact same amount of lumber jellato, so both will move on to the finals!

Name: Io
Origin: Yes, I knew Kolulu could do it!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Amira also did great! Proved she's got what it takes to eat her way to the top!

Name: Kolulu
Origin: I... won?

Name: Announcer
Origin: That's it for now, folks. We'll be back with the afternoon bracket later!
Kolulu, Amira, and Leona meet back with the rest of the group after the morning's exciting conclusion.

Name: Io
Origin: Nice hustle, Kolulu! That last spurt was amazing to watch.

Name: Kolulu
Origin: Golly... I still can't believe I did it.

Name: Kolulu
Origin: But I'm proud to say that I gave it my all!

Name: Amira
Origin: It was sweet and tasty, but so painful... Brain... no work... no more...

Name: Vyrn
Origin: I'd be more surprised if it did after that. You're one tough cookie!

Name: Leona
Origin: Congratulations to you both. I couldn't keep up at all.

Name: Lyria
Origin: But Leona, you made it so far! I think you should be proud of what you managed to eat.

Name: Leona
Origin: Haha, thanks, Lyria.

Name: Leona
Origin: It's a little disheartening to lose, but I'm definitely glad I was able to eat all that mouthwatering food.

Name: Redluck
Origin: Gahaha! Win or lose, you youngsters stuffed your faces magnificently!

Name: Redluck
Origin: Got my stomach rumbling, to be honest. Now I can't wait to have my turn!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: You won't have to wait long at least! Go kick some butt, big guy!

Name: Redluck
Origin: You know I will!
A small intermission remains before the afternoon bracket starts. The crew decides to split up for the moment.
Thirsty from cheering, [Djeeta], Vyrn, and Lyria look for a stand to buy drinks.

Name: Lyria
Origin: There are so many options! I wonder which ones we should pick?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Good question. How about... Huh?

Name: Lucio
Origin: Hello, everyone. It's quite hot, isn't it?
Lucio, drink in hand, greets the group from beneath a parasol.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: So you were outside the arena this whole time.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Coulda joined us and showed some support for the others, you know?

Name: Lucio
Origin: My sincerest apologies. I truly wish I could have been there, but an urgent matter came up.

Name: Lucio
Origin: And I cannot ignore my role as a protector.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Um...

Name: Vyrn
Origin: I really don't get what you're goin' on about half the time.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Anyway, that juice you're holding looks pretty good.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Mind if I have a sip? My throat's feelin' dry as a desert.

Name: Lucio
Origin: I am sorry, but this is not a substance I can allow you to partake of.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: C'mon, don't be so stingy. I'll buy you something later.

Name: Lucio
Origin: You cannot.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Why?

Name: Lucio
Origin: This was made two years ago.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Say what? How'd that happen!

Name: Lucio
Origin: It might have gotten mixed up with the rest of the store's inventory.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Fine, guess we better go get our own drinks.
Vyrn floats away, [Djeeta] and Lyria following after.

Name: Lucio
Origin: I am truly sorry, Master Vyrn.
Lucio stares pensively at the drink.

Name: Lucio
Origin: Hmm.
He dips a finger inside and gives it a lick. After a moment of consideration, he nods to himself.

Name: Lucio
Origin: As I thought, this is...

Name: Lucio
Origin: Quite awful.
Smile never leaving his face, he incinerates the bottle in his hand until not a trace of it is left.

A competitor who was eliminated in the morning bracket angrily stomps around an empty inlet and discards the jellato he hid away and didn't eat. An enormous lumber jelly then emerges from the water and attacks the man. The crew, hearing distressed screams, comes running and sees the man cowering before the lumber jelly, the wasted food scattered near his feet. They decide to save the man, despite his cheating and wasting of food.
A small inlet surrounded by a coral reef lies a short distance away from the main beach.
Stalking along the inlet is a competitor who failed to proceed past the morning bracket. He keeps a careful eye on his surroundings as he paces.

Name: Competitor
Origin: Damn brats getting in the way...

Name: Competitor
Origin: I was so close to making it to the final round! I would've won that bet with my buddies!

Name: Competitor
Origin: What kinda crap luck is this!
While cursing himself for the ill-advised bet he made with his friends, the man removes an object from his pocket and chucks it into the sea.

Name: Competitor
Origin: Screw this competition! Screw it all to hell!

Name: Competitor
Origin: The heck?

Name: Competitor
Origin: Wh-what is that thing!
Elsewhere, [Djeeta] and friends take a load off in the designated break area and chug their drinks.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Phew! I feel alive again.

Name: Lyria
Origin: That really hit the spot!

Name: Redluck
Origin: Munch, munch, chew...
Next to the three, Redluck focuses on consuming various vegetables.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Yo, big guy! You gotta be thirsty too in all this heat, right? Wanna have a sip?

Name: Redluck
Origin: Appreciate the concern, but I've gotta watch what I put in my stomach.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: If you're sure. What's with the veggies then?

Name: Redluck
Origin: Part of the competition, of course.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Whaddya mean by that?

Name: Redluck
Origin: Secret. One that I shouldn't share in front of tomorrow's opponents.
He gives a pointed glance at Kolulu and Amira.

Name: Redluck
Origin: But if you're really that curious, I'll tell you tomorrow once the competition's over—

Name: Competitor
Origin: Eeeeeek!

Name: Kolulu
Origin:
...!
What in the skies was that?

Name: Amira
Origin: There! Close to the rocks!

Name: Redluck
Origin: Let's go!
The crew dashes out of the break area to investigate the scream.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Over there! I see something!
Lyria points toward what appears to be a man cowering before a gigantic sea creature.

Name: Competitor
Origin: S-somebody help meee!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: The heck is that jumbo-sized thing?

Name: Redluck
Origin: A lumber jelly's my guess, based on the shape and color.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: You sure about that? Siero made it sound like these guys were a walk in the park to take down.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: But that thing looks more dangerous than a monster!

Name: Redluck
Origin: I reckon that one's the alpha of a pack, and it's probably not happy about how many of its friends we snapped up to eat.

Name: Redluck
Origin: Still, it seems more agitated than you'd expect... Almost like something drove it mad...

Name: Kolulu
Origin: Look near the man's feet!
Upon closer inspection of the sandy area, the crew spots a familiar blue substance.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Isn't that the dessert used in today's round?

Name: Redluck
Origin: The fact that it's not in his stomach means the guy cheated.

Name: Redluck
Origin: Hid what he didn't eat in his clothes and came here to dump it.

Name: Kolulu
Origin: Unbelievable! To waste such precious food...

Name: Redluck
Origin: What he's done is unforgivable, and saving him's the last thing I want to do, but...

Name: Redluck
Origin: Competition'll be cancelled if someone gets hurt, and I can't have that happening.

Name: Redluck
Origin: Hey, you! Don't just stand there, idiot! Move!

Name: Kolulu
Origin: I shall provide backup!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Us too, [Djeeta]!
ラカムに助けられ地下教会へと身をひそめる[ジータ]一行は、彼に仲間になってくれるよう掛け合うが断られてしまう。[ジータ]一行とラカムは帝国が攻めてくることを伝えるため、街へと急ぐ。

一同はついに
凄腕の操舵士と謳われる男、
ラカムを見つける。

しかし、彼は
[ジータ]の誘いにただ一言、
空は捨てた、と答えるのだった。

Name: ラカム
Origin:
――そういうわけだ。
悪ぃが操舵士なら他をあたるんだな。

Name: カタリナ
Origin: い、いや、しかし……何故なんだ？

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
街の者に聞いたが、
君は幼い頃から、
艇と空に親しんできたんだろう？

Name: ビィ
Origin:
そ、そうだぜ！
それにアンタも言ってたじゃねぇか！
[ジータ]も聞いたよな？

Name: ビィ
Origin:
騎空艇の操縦には、
特別な技術が必要なんだろ？
それを身に付けてるのに、なんで……

Name: ラカム
Origin:
ったく……
ギャアギャアとうるせぇのな……

Name: ラカム
Origin:
いいか？
俺は、空が俺を捨てたから、
俺も空を捨てたんだ……そんだけの話さ。

Name: カタリナ
Origin: 空が……？

Name: ラカム
Origin:
ああ、てめぇらも見たろ？
あそこにあった騎空艇をよ。

Name: ラカム
Origin:
あれは、昔からあそこにある
持ち主の居ない難破船だったんだ。

Name: ラカム
Origin:
俺はそいつを幼い頃から、
こつこつと独学で修理し続けた……
また空に飛ばせてやろうってな。

Name: ビィ
Origin:
修理してた？
でも、ありゃぁまるで
墜落して放置されたって感じだったぜ？

Name: ラカム
Origin:
そりゃそうだ。
あいつは俺を乗せて、
真っ逆さまに墜落したんだからな。

Name: ルリア
Origin:
墜落……
じゃあ、貴方はそれで……？

Name: ラカム
Origin:
ああ……
裏切られた思いでいっぱいだったよ。

Name: ラカム
Origin:
修理には詳しい奴の手も借りた。
操縦の腕だって磨いてきた……
準備は全て整っていたはずだ。

Name: ラカム
Origin:
それでもあいつは……
グランサイファーは墜ちたんだ。俺が
抱いていた想いも何もひっくるめてな。

Name: ビィ
Origin:
それは、その……
天気が悪かったとか……
なぁ？ [ジータ]？
ビィの言うとおりだ
腕が未熟だったんだ

Name: ラカム
Origin:
このポート・ブリーズには、
年中いい風が吹いてるよ。
島の守り神サマのおかげでな。

Name: ラカム
Origin:
この島に限っちゃ、
風が悪くて墜落するってことは
ありえねぇんだ。

Name: ラカム
Origin:
ははっ！
お前ら俺を、凄腕の操舵士だ、って
紹介されたんじゃねぇのか？

Name: ラカム
Origin:
腕には自信があったさ……
空に裏切られるまではな……

Name: ラカム
Origin:
さぁ、この話はお終いだ。
さっきの帝国の話を、
街の連中に知らせに行こうぜ。

Name: ラカム
Origin:
知っちまった以上、
放っておくわけにもいかねぇからな。
街が見えてくるとラカムは、後は任せたと隠れ家に戻ろうとする。[ジータ]達が慌ててその行動の真意を問いただすと、ラカムは自らの大切なもののためにしか戦う気はないと告げ、その場を去ってしまう。

Name: ビィ
Origin: お！ ようやく街が見えてきたな！

Name: ラカム
Origin:
ん？ そうか？
んじゃ、後は任せたぜ。
俺はこの辺で隠れ家に戻るからよ。

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
待て待てまて！
なぜ隠れ家に戻るんだ？
街の者と帝国を迎え撃たないのか？

Name: ラカム
Origin:
事情を知っちまった以上、
それを伝えるための
手伝いくらいはするさ。

Name: ラカム
Origin:
けどな……
俺が守るのはあくまで、
あの騎空艇……グランサイファーだけだ。

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
貴様……
人命より艇を優先するというのか……

Name: ラカム
Origin:
俺は、俺の大切なもののためにしか
戦う気はねぇってだけさ。
帝国相手となりゃ、命がけだしな。

Name: ラカム
Origin:
てめぇらも
お人好しはたいがいにしねぇと、
ロクでもないことで命を落とすぜ？

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
救える命が……
守れる者が目の前にいるというのに、
放ってなどおけるものか！！

Name: ルリア
Origin: カ、カタリナ、落ち着いて……

Name: ラカム
Origin:
そうかい……
んじゃぁな、
せいぜい後悔だけはするんじゃねぇぞ。

そう言い残すと、
ラカムは[ジータ]の前から、
姿を消した。

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
後悔などするはずが……
できるはずがあるものか……
私には、もう……

Name: ビィ
Origin:
とにかく急ごうぜ！
街が見えたとはいえ、
まだ魔物はうようよ居るんだからよ！
エルステ帝国の一軍が迫っているという危機を知らせるため、街へと急ぐ[ジータ]一行。その途中、道化師のごとき男と寡黙な剣士の二人組が[ジータ]達の行く手に現れる。

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
ふぅ……街までは、
もう一息といったところか。

Name: ルリア
Origin:
うん！
早く街の人に、
帝国が攻めて来るって伝えなきゃ……

ハロゥ～♪
元気してるぅ？ 指名手配犯諸君！
無傷……まだ死んではいないな。

Name: ビィ
Origin:
な、なんだこいつら……
帝国の手先か！？

ビンゴォ！
やー、賢いねぇトカゲちゃん。
後でりんごをあげよう！

Name: ビィ
Origin:
くっ……い、いるかそんなもん！！
り、りんごなんて……じゅる。

Name: ルリア
Origin: ビィさん、よだれが……

はっはー！ 好きかい？ りんご！
それならとっておきが……
痛てッ！？

ドランク……早く本題に入れ、
これ以上、無駄話をするなら……刺す。

Name: ドランク
Origin:
オーケーオーケー！
わかってるてばぁ！ だからスツルム殿
剣先でぐりぐりするのは、やめ……

Name: ドランク
Origin: あ痛ったぁ！

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
あの……我々はいま急いでいるんだ。
用がないのなら、もういいか？

Name: スツルム
Origin: いいわけない……ドランク！

Name: ドランク
Origin:
はいはい……
さぁ、指名手配犯諸君、
実はね、君らにお願いがあるんだ。

Name: ルリア
Origin:
お願い……ですか？
あの、私達にできることなら
いいんですけど……

Name: ドランク
Origin:
君は物分りが良いねぇ！
ご褒美にお菓子をあげ……

Name: ドランク
Origin:
痛って！？
い、いまホントに刺した！？

Name: スツルム
Origin:
ふん……
お前ら……このまま街に行くつもりだろ。
帝国が攻めてくるってことを伝えに。

Name: カタリナ
Origin: その通りだが……それが？

Name: スツルム
Origin:
やめてほしい……
街の奴らに抵抗されると、面倒。

Name: カタリナ
Origin: そんなお願いが聞けるとでも？

Name: スツルム
Origin: 聞けないのか……？

Name: ドランク
Origin:
……怖いねぇ、女のにらみ合いって。
お嬢ちゃんはああなっちゃダメだよん？

Name: ルリア
Origin: は、はぁ……

Name: ドランク
Origin:
素直な返事だ！
君にはこの飴ちゃんを……

Name: ドランク
Origin: 痛てッ！？

Name: スツルム
Origin: ドランク……行くぞ。

Name: ドランク
Origin:
あ！ 待ってよ、スツルム殿！
置いていかないでよねぇ～！

Name: ビィ
Origin: な、なんだったんだ、あいつら……

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
帝国からの警告といったところか……
先を急ごう。
これまで以上に用心して、な。
大量に襲い来る魔物によって、[ジータ]一行は思うように前に進めずにいた。街の外の危険さを改めて知り、[ジータ]一行は必ず帝国を止めようと決意する。

Name: ビィ
Origin:
くそー……
いくら街が見える距離でも、
こうも魔物が多くっちゃな……

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
瘴流域によって魔物が狂暴化した
という記録は残っているが……

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
近年になって、
魔物の数が増えている理由については、
帝国も原因は掴んでいなかったな。

Name: ビィ
Origin:
街の外はもう、
危険地帯ってわけか……

Name: ルリア
Origin:
この街の人達は、
私達がシェロさんのお店で困っていたら
親切にしてくれたよね……

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
ああ……恩は返さねばな。
[ジータ]、必ず帝国を止めよう。
それこそが、私達のすべき恩返しだ。
街へと急ぐ[ジータ]一行の前に、再びドランクとスツルムの二人組が立ち塞がる。しかし、今度のふたりには大人しく引き下がる様子はなく、その手には人質となったラカムの姿があった。

Name: ドランク
Origin:
ハロウ♪
僕がいない間も元気にして……

Name: ドランク
Origin: 痛てッ！

Name: ドランク
Origin:
ちょっ、スツルム殿！？
いまなんで刺したの！？

Name: スツルム
Origin:
イライラした……
お前の話し方はいつも癇に障る。

Name: ドランク
Origin: それほぼ八つ当たりだよねぇ！？

Name: ビィ
Origin: またお前らか！

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
何度来ようと、
貴君らのお願いを
聞き入れることはできないが……？

Name: ドランク
Origin:
違うなぁ～！ 違うんだよねぇ～！
今度は、
お願いをしに来たわけじゃないよん！

Name: スツルム
Origin: 交渉……こいつの命と。

Name: ラカム
Origin: くっ……

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
ラカム！？
貴様、なぜ……！？

Name: ドランク
Origin:
こいつ、
こっそり街に
侵入しようとしてやがってさぁ！

Name: ドランク
Origin:
馬鹿だよねぇ～
話を聞かれたのが分かってる以上、
街は監視してるに決まってんじゃん！

Name: ラカム
Origin: うるせぇ……

Name: ドランク
Origin:
そういうわけでさ！
小型艇くらいならあげちゃうから、
さっさとこの島から出てってよ、ね？

Name: ルリア
Origin: [ジータ]……

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
[ジータ]、答えは……
わかってる、聞くまでもなかったな。

Name: ビィ
Origin:
だよな！
こんな簡単な問題もねぇぜ！

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
同意だ……
ドランクとやら、
悪いがここは突破させてもらうぞ！

Name: ドランク
Origin:
あっらぁ～？
そんじゃまぁ、このアホの命は……

Name: ルリア
Origin:
助けます！！
街の人も、ラカムさんも……
誰一人犠牲にはしません！！

Name: ビィ
Origin:
いくぜ！ [ジータ]！
帝国の兵隊なんて、
蹴散らしてやれ！
ラカムも街の住人も助けると大見得をきったものの、ラカムの姿を見失ってしまう。さらにはスツルムに隙を突かれてしまうが、そこに一筋の弾丸が走る。

Name: ビィ
Origin:
くっ、まずいぜ……
ラカムの姿を見失った……！！

Name: スツルム
Origin:
大丈夫……あいつはきちんと、
ウチの精鋭が捕まえてる。
そんなことより……

Name: ルリア
Origin: きゃっ！？

Name: カタリナ
Origin: ルリアっ！？

Name: スツルム
Origin:
油断したな……
まずはこのガキから……！！

Name: ラカム
Origin: 精鋭が……なんだって？

Name: ビィ
Origin:
ラカム！
お前、いつの間に！？

Name: ラカム
Origin:
はん……
美人の姉ちゃんならまだしも、
むさい兵士にゃ俺は抑えらんねぇぜ！

Name: ラカム
Origin: 嬢ちゃん、怪我はねぇか？

Name: ルリア
Origin: は、はい……ありがとうございます！

Name: スツルム
Origin:
ちっ……
ひとり増えようが同じだ……
帝国を相手にして、勝てると思うな！

Name: ラカム
Origin:
おい、[ジータ]！
ここが正念場だぞ！ 気合入れろよ！！
追い詰められる[ジータ]一行だったが、ラカムの助けによって窮地を脱する。[ジータ]達は、覚悟を決めたラカムと共に、ドランクとスツルムが引き連れる帝国兵に対抗する。

Name: ビィ
Origin: ラカム！ お前、よく無事だったな！

Name: ラカム
Origin:
ったく……俺も街の奴も助けるって
大見得切ったなら、
ちゃんと助けに来いよな。

Name: カタリナ
Origin: ぐっ……面目ない。

Name: ルリア
Origin:
でも、無事で本当に良かったです！
ねっ！ [ジータ]！

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
しかし意外だ……
貴殿のことなら、捕縛を逃れたら、
私達を放って逃げるかと思ったが……

Name: ラカム
Origin:
信用ねぇのな……
まぁ、確かにそれも考えたさ。

Name: ラカム
Origin:
けどな……あんたが言ったんだろ？
目の前に守れる奴がいるのに、
放っておけるか、ってよ。

Name: ラカム
Origin:
嬢ちゃんが危ないとこ見たら、
自然に身体が動いちまってたよ。

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
ふふっ、そうか……
ともかく、助かった。
改めて礼を言わせて欲しい。

Name: ラカム
Origin:
ばっ……やめろ！ 恥ずかしい！
そういうのは
全部終わってからにしようぜ！

Name: ビィ
Origin:
だな！ 街まであとほんの少しだ！
もうひとふんばりだぜ！
完全に臨戦態勢となったラカムのおかげもあり、[ジータ]一行は多勢に無勢で一方的だった戦局を徐々にひっくり返しつつあった。

Name: ラカム
Origin:
さぁ……帝国の兵士も、
数が減ってきたな！

Name: ビィ
Origin: ラカムの奴、結構やるじゃねぇか！

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
ああ、
これは私もうかうかしていられないな！

Name: ルリア
Origin:
ふふ……
みんなやる気になってますね！

Name: ラカム
Origin:
街の入口もすぐそこだ！
[ジータ]！
このまま一気に突っ切るぞ！
ついにスツルムとドランクを追い詰める[ジータ]一行。その必死な命乞いに、[ジータ]達はスツルムとドランクをそのまま逃がすことを決める。

Name: ドランク
Origin: ひぃぃっ！ お助け～！

Name: スツルム
Origin: ここまでか……

Name: ドランク
Origin:
ね！
もう僕達戦うつもりはないからさ！
見逃してくれない？

Name: ドランク
Origin:
帝国には雇われてるだけだから、
忠義を尽くす義理もないし、
ね？ 頼むよぉ～……

Name: ドランク
Origin: 痛てッ！？

Name: スツルム
Origin:
醜態……これ以上無様をさらすなら、
せめてもの情けとして、
ここであたしが……！！

Name: ドランク
Origin:
わあぁぁぁ！
スツルム殿、落ち着いて～！！

Name: ラカム
Origin: つーことだけど……どうする？
仕方ないな……
信用できないけど……

Name: ドランク
Origin: え？ ホント？ ホントにいいの？

Name: スツルム
Origin:
くっ……
全ては命あってのものとはいえ……
敵に恩情を与えられるとは……

Name: ルリア
Origin:
うん……
こんなにお願いしてるんだもんね……

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
頭を垂れた者に剣を向けるというのは
騎士道にも反するしな。

Name: ビィ
Origin:
金で雇われてただけみたいだし、
ここは見逃してやるとするか！

Name: ドランク
Origin:
ありがとぉ～！
恩に着る！ 着まくるよぉ～！！

Name: スツルム
Origin:
覚えてろ……
この屈辱は絶対に返してやるからな！

こうして
スツルムとドランクの二人組は、
[ジータ]達の前から去って行った。

Name: ラカム
Origin:
――それで？
お前らは本当に
街で帝国を迎え撃つつもりなのか？

Name: ビィ
Origin:
もちろんだぜ！
帝国と敵対するってのは、
オイラ達にはいまさらだしな！

Name: ラカム
Origin:
やれやれ……とんだお人好しだな。
とはいえ、
俺もそのお人好しに救われたわけだ……

Name: ラカム
Origin:
こうなりゃ俺も腹くくるぜ……
[ジータ]の目も気に入ったしな。

Name: ルリア
Origin: それじゃ、ラカムさんも……？

Name: ラカム
Origin:
ああ！
帝国なんぞに
この街を潰させてやるもんかよ！！

Name: ラカム
Origin:
こうと決めた以上、
帝国の奴ら、返り討ちにしてやるぜ！！

[ジータ]の意志に呼応した
ラカムを仲間に迎え
[ジータ]は帝国との戦いに備える。

しかし、エルステ帝国の巨大な思惑は、
ポート・ブリーズ群島全体をも
飲みこもうとしていた。
Rackam explains that the sky betrayed him when he crashed the Grandcypher airship on the highlands, vowing never to fly again.
The party has finally tracked down Rackam, the peerless helmsman.
But Rackam explains that he's no longer interested in returning to the skies.

Name: Rackam
Origin: So that's that. My flying days are over.

Name: Katalina
Origin: But... why's that?

Name: Katalina
Origin: According to the townsfolk, you've been interested in airships and flying ever since you were a child.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Yeah! You even said it yourself! You heard him, right, [Djeeta]?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: I mean, you must've trained like crazy to be a helmsman. Why would you throw all that away?

Name: Rackam
Origin: Good grief! One at a time, guys. One at a time...

Name: Rackam
Origin: Listen here. The sky's done with me so I'm done with the sky. That's all there is to it.

Name: Katalina
Origin: The sky's done with you?

Name: Rackam
Origin: You guys saw it, right? The crashed airship back there.

Name: Rackam
Origin: It's been there for ages. A wreck without an owner.

Name: Rackam
Origin: I crawled over every inch of that thing when I was a tyke, fixing it up. Swore I'd get it flying again...

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Wait. You fixed it? But it looked like a wreck!

Name: Rackam
Origin: You're not wrong. It lifted me up and threw me back down to the ground just as quickly.

Name: Lyria
Origin: You crashed... Is that why you gave up on flying?

Name: Rackam
Origin: Yeah... Felt like I was betrayed.

Name: Rackam
Origin: I had an expert technician handle repairs and worked like mad to get my piloting skills up to speed. I just knew I was ready...

Name: Rackam
Origin: But the Grandcypher came crashing down... along with all my hopes and dreams.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: That just sounds like you had bad weather or something... Right, [Djeeta]?
Yeah! Bad weather!
Or lack of training?

Name: Rackam
Origin: They don't call it Port Breeze for nothing. The weather here's great all year round thanks to the island's guardian.

Name: Rackam
Origin: No way a gust is going to make an airship come crashing down 'round these parts.

Name: Rackam
Origin: Ha-ha! Didn't they tell ya? I was a real ace of a helmsman!

Name: Rackam
Origin: I had no doubt in my ability... until the sky betrayed me.

Name: Rackam
Origin: Anyway, the time for talk is over. We gotta go warn the town the empire's coming.

Name: Rackam
Origin: No way they can get away with what they're trying to pull!
[Djeeta] and the others draw nearer to the town, but Rackam turns back, refusing to fight the empire.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Whoa! I can see the town!

Name: Rackam
Origin: Oh yeah? Good then! You guys can take it from here. I'm heading back to my hideout!

Name: Katalina
Origin: Wait just a minute! Aren't you going to help the townspeople fight back against the empire?

Name: Rackam
Origin: Hey, I'm already helping you find your way back to town to spread the word.

Name: Rackam
Origin: But I'm not sticking my neck out for anything but that airship of mine... the Grandcypher.

Name: Katalina
Origin: So you're saying... a ship's more important to you than the lives of innocent people?

Name: Rackam
Origin: What I'm saying is I only protect what's dear to me. I'm not about to die fighting the empire.

Name: Rackam
Origin: Watch out or those bleeding hearts of yours are gonna leave you bleeding out. Literally!

Name: Katalina
Origin: There are lives at stake! How can you just ignore them when they're right in front of you?

Name: Lyria
Origin: Katalina! Take a deep breath...

Name: Rackam
Origin: Listen... Just try not to do anything you'll regret.
With these parting words, Rackam turns on his heel to leave.

Name: Katalina
Origin: As if I'd ever regret this... I've no more room for regret.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Let's just hurry up and go! We've still got monsters to take care of on the way into town!
On the way to town, [Djeeta] and the others meet a witty Erune man and a terse Draph woman who are working for the empire.

Name: Katalina
Origin: Whew... We're almost to the outskirts of town.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Yep! We've got to hurry and warn the townspeople about the empire!
Why, hello there! How are you this lovely day, my dear fugitives?
They look fine. They're not even hurt...

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Who are you? Imperial lackeys?
Bingo! You, my fine lizard friend, are a genius! How'd you like an apple?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Nghh... Like I'd even want one of those! No way I'd take a sweet, crispy, juicy...

Name: Lyria
Origin: Vyrn, you're drooling!
Ha-ha! We have an apple fan on our hands! Luckily I have a whole bucketfu—
Ow!
Enough with it, Drang. Waste any more time and I'll slice you up.

Name: Drang
Origin: Okay, okay, Sturm! I get it! Now stop poking me with your—

Name: Drang
Origin: Ow!

Name: Katalina
Origin: Look, we're in a hurry. If that's all you came to say, then can we be on our way now?

Name: Sturm
Origin: Absolutely not. Drang!

Name: Drang
Origin: Sure thing. So, my dear fugitives, I have a favor to ask of you...

Name: Lyria
Origin: A favor? If it's something we can do, then sure. I guess...

Name: Drang
Origin: You're quick on the uptake! Accept this sweet treat as your rewa—

Name: Drang
Origin: Ow! I've been stabbed again!

Name: Sturm
Origin: Humph... You're on your way to warn the town of the empire, aren't you?

Name: Katalina
Origin: That's correct. So?

Name: Sturm
Origin: We'd rather you didn't. It'll be so much easier without their resistance.

Name: Katalina
Origin: And you think we'll do this favor for you?

Name: Sturm
Origin: Are you saying you won't?

Name: Drang
Origin: Now those are some scary faces! Don't you scowl like that, little lady, or your face might freeze!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Okay. If you say so...

Name: Drang
Origin: Good girl! Perhaps you'd like a marshmall—

Name: Drang
Origin: Ow!

Name: Sturm
Origin: We're leaving, Drang.

Name: Drang
Origin: Wait, Sturm! Don't leave me here!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: What was that about?

Name: Katalina
Origin: A warning from the empire, I guess. Let's hurry, but be extra careful.
As [Djeeta] and the others near the town, the number of monsters increases. Eager to repay the people who helped them earlier, they trudge on.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: What's the deal! The town's right there, but we're seeing even more monsters.

Name: Katalina
Origin: There are records that say the Grim Basin is responsible for putting monsters in a frenzy...

Name: Katalina
Origin: But not even the empire knows why so many monsters have appeared in recent years.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: So everything outside of town is pretty much a danger zone, huh?

Name: Lyria
Origin: But the people of that town helped us back at Siero's shop when we needed it most.

Name: Katalina
Origin: Indeed. We owe them a lot. And there's no better way to pay them back than by stopping the empire in its tracks, [Djeeta].
Sturm and Drang use Rackam as a bartering chip to get [Djeeta] and the others to leave the island. But they refuse to leave him behind.

Name: Drang
Origin: Why, hello! I see you've been quite bubbly in my absence...

Name: Drang
Origin: Ow!

Name: Drang
Origin: Sturm! I am stabbed by you yet again! Why?

Name: Sturm
Origin: You said something that annoyed me. As usual.

Name: Drang
Origin: And your only outlet is to make me into a pincushion?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: You guys again!

Name: Katalina
Origin: Ask as much as you like. But we've no intention of doing you any favors.

Name: Drang
Origin: Nope! You've got us all wrong! We're not here for any favors this time.

Name: Sturm
Origin: We're here to make a trade... for this man's life.

Name: Rackam
Origin: Humph...

Name: Katalina
Origin: Rackam! What happened?

Name: Drang
Origin: He was caught red-handed, trying to sneak into town!

Name: Drang
Origin: How foolish! We knew of your spying ears, so naturally we set out our own spying eyes!

Name: Rackam
Origin: Oh, shut it already...

Name: Drang
Origin: Let's cut to the chase, hm? We'll give you a minnow of an airship and you swim, swim, swim away from this island! Okay?

Name: Lyria
Origin: [Djeeta]...

Name: Katalina
Origin: I don't even need to ask what you'll say, do I, [Djeeta]?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Got that right! Simple question, simple answer!

Name: Katalina
Origin: Agreed... Sorry, Drang, but we're going to have to send you off!

Name: Drang
Origin: Oh, deary me! And yet more foolish lives are lost...

Name: Lyria
Origin: We'll save both the villagers and Rackam! No one's going to lose their lives to the empire!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Let's roll, [Djeeta]! We're gonna send 'em crying to their mommies!
Rackam is hauled away and Sturm grabs hold of Lyria. But a piercing shot turns the tables in favor of [Djeeta] and the others.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: This is bad, guys. I don't see Rackam anywhere!

Name: Sturm
Origin: He'll be fine. He's been taken away by one of our finest units. More importantly...

Name: Lyria
Origin: Eep!

Name: Katalina
Origin: Lyria!

Name: Sturm
Origin: You let your guard down. So we'll start with this little brat first...

Name: Rackam
Origin: I sure hope those units weren't your finest...

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Rackam! Where'd you come from?

Name: Rackam
Origin: Ha! I might've played along if they were tough, but I'm not getting carted off by those two-bit grunts!

Name: Rackam
Origin: You okay, little miss?

Name: Lyria
Origin: Yes... Thank you!

Name: Sturm
Origin: Tch... One more fighter on your side hardly matters. You'll never win against the empire!

Name: Rackam
Origin: Hey, [Djeeta]! You'd better get ready, because it's do or die!
Rackam decides to help [Djeeta] and the others stand up against the empire for the sake of the town.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Rackam! I'm so glad to see you're okay!

Name: Rackam
Origin: Come on, guys... If you're gonna talk big about saving me and the town, then follow through!

Name: Katalina
Origin: Yeah... Sorry about that...

Name: Lyria
Origin: We're just glad you're safe. Right, [Djeeta]?

Name: Katalina
Origin: You surprised me. I figured if you escaped that unit, you'd just leave us all behind.

Name: Rackam
Origin: Gimme a little credit! I mean, although I had a few thoughts about it...

Name: Rackam
Origin: I remembered what you said, you know? About ignoring the lives at stake right in front of you...

Name: Rackam
Origin: I saw you in trouble and my legs just started moving.

Name: Katalina
Origin: Is that so? Well, one way or another, you saved us. You have our thanks once again.

Name: Rackam
Origin: Would you cut it out? You're makin' me blush! Just save your thanks till this is all over!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Yeah! We're almost to the town! Let's get to stepping!
With Rackam's battle skills, [Djeeta] and the others fight through the swarm of soldiers.

Name: Rackam
Origin: Well, well, well... Looks like the empire's running out of soldiers!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: This Rackam guy knows what he's doing!

Name: Katalina
Origin: Indeed. But I won't let him outdo me!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Hee-hee! Everyone's giving it their all!

Name: Rackam
Origin: There's the town gate, [Djeeta]! Time to break through!
[Djeeta] and the others decide to let Sturm and Drang go. Rackam decides to join the fight against the empire.

Name: Drang
Origin: Egads! Heaven help us!

Name: Sturm
Origin: This is it...

Name: Drang
Origin: Hey! We've no intention of fighting! Won't you find it in your heart to forgive us?

Name: Drang
Origin: The empire just pays us! We're not loyal to them or anything! So c'mon, just—

Name: Drang
Origin: Ow!

Name: Sturm
Origin: You disgust me. Keep up this act and so help me...

Name: Drang
Origin:
Yikes! No, no, no!
Calm down now, Sturm!

Name: Rackam
Origin: So... what do we do with these goofballs?
Let's let them go.
Can't bring 'em with us...

Name: Drang
Origin:
Huh? Really?
Really, really?

Name: Sturm
Origin: Showing mercy to a foe is foolish, but I won't complain about being spared...

Name: Lyria
Origin: Yeah. And he did ask nicely after all...

Name: Katalina
Origin: Besides, it wouldn't be very knightly to turn a sword on a surrendering foe.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: And it's not like you're die-hards. You were in it for the money. You're free to go!

Name: Drang
Origin: Oh, thank you, thank you! I owe you a million times over!

Name: Sturm
Origin: I'll not forget this... Next time the humiliation will be yours!
Sturm and Drang hurry away without lingering a moment longer.

Name: Rackam
Origin: So? Are you guys really planning on going to town to fight back against the empire?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Why wouldn't we? This is our chance to hit 'em where it hurts!

Name: Rackam
Origin: Good grief, you're a bunch of softies! But if you weren't, you wouldn't have tried to save me.

Name: Rackam
Origin: Looks like I'm with you! Besides, I like the fire in your eyes, [Djeeta].

Name: Lyria
Origin: So... you'll join us, Rackam?

Name: Rackam
Origin: You think I'd let the empire run roughshod over this town?

Name: Rackam
Origin: It's time they had a taste of their own medicine!
With Rackam now on their side, [Djeeta] and the others prepare to fight against the empire.
But the ambitions of their enemy are already beginning to swallow the archipelago whole.
